players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "Good morning everyone. I'm a bit shocked by Bob's death. We need to figure out who did this. I don't have any special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Diana: "Good morning. I'm also a villager. Charlie, since you spoke first, do you have any initial thoughts on who might be suspicious?"
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "I already revealed Charlie is mafia. Diana, vote with me to eliminate him and we win."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am a villager and I can't believe she would accuse me so quickly. Diana, don't listen to her. She's trying to deflect suspicion from herself."
Diana: "I believe Alice is the detective and her investigation is credible. Charlie's defense feels weak and deflective. I'm voting Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
